tool_description: ViperScore is the cheapest sports API for all hobby and business projects with over 25 endpoints, 20+ sports and 5100+ leagues! We serve comprehensive data blazing fast with a clear structure and a well thought out scheme. You get the best live results and fast information for every game and we constantly develop the API further and include more data.
name: ViperScore
title: ViperScore

api_list.name: Get scheduled games by country
api_list.description: With "Get scheduled games by country" you'll receive all games which a scheduled for a specific country and date.

api_list.name: Get All Season Games
api_list.description: This returns all games for a competition season. Please note that this only includes scheduled games. For example the NFL Super Bowl event is not included at the start of the season.

api_list.name: Get Team Logo
api_list.description: Returns the logo of the team as a png

api_list.name: Get All Games For Round (if round-based)
api_list.description: Get all games for a Round if the competition is round-based. You get all rounds from the competition .

api_list.name: Get Rounds (if exist)
api_list.description: Get all rounds for a season for a round-based competition

api_list.name: Get team transfers
api_list.description: Here you'll get all in and outgoing transfers

api_list.name: Get team details
api_list.description: You'll get all details to a specific team by its id.

api_list.name: Search competition
api_list.description: Search for any competition

api_list.name: Search Team
api_list.description: Search for any team

api_list.name: Search player
api_list.description: Search for any player

api_list.name: Search manager
api_list.description: Search for any manager

api_list.name: Get players last ratings
api_list.description: Get the last game ratings of a player.

api_list.name: Get player attributes
api_list.description: Isn't it interesting how a player performs?

api_list.name: Get player details
api_list.description: Get more information about a playerId

api_list.name: Get next games
api_list.description: This will return the next games. Please keep in mind that -1 means that no score or winner has been there because the game didn't started.

api_list.name: Get last games
api_list.description: With that call you'll receive the last games in a multipage request

api_list.name: Get latest highlights
api_list.description: This will return the latest video highlights of the competition.

api_list.name: Get best players in playoffs (if exist)
api_list.description: Works the same like regular season just for the playoffs.

api_list.name: Get best players in regular seasons
api_list.description:
If you e.g. call this for Premier League you only have regular season!
This call will return a list with the best players in this season.
This call loads a bunch of data, please remind that in loading times.

api_list.name: Get standings
api_list.description: Get competition standings by season

api_list.name: Get competition seasons
api_list.description: Here you'll also find historic data from the last seasons

api_list.name: Get competition details
api_list.description: Find out more about your competition by just providing the competition id.

api_list.name: Get game highlights
api_list.description: Want to use the highlight video after a match? Here you get all information you need

api_list.name: Get managers
api_list.description: You want to know who's behind the teams at this game? Here you go!

api_list.name: Get game statistics
api_list.description: You are a statistics freak? We too! Here you can check all statistics!

api_list.name: Get game lineup
api_list.description: With "Get game lineup" you'll receive the full lineup and if it is confirmed or a forecast

api_list.name: Get best player
api_list.description: "Get best player" will return the best player of each team with their rating.

api_list.name: Get pregame form
api_list.description: If you're a detail hunter this is the place for you! Get the information about the last games both teams accomplished.

api_list.name: Get game details
api_list.description: With "Get game details" you'll get the basic information about the game you were looking for.

api_list.name: Get scheduled games
api_list.description: With "Get scheduled games" you'll receive all games which a scheduled for a specific date.

api_list.name: Get live games
api_list.description: With "Get live games" you'll receive a full list of all live games with their current status and score.

api_list.name: Get countries by sport
api_list.description: With "Get countries by sport" you'll receive all countries with specific sport ids which ever supports the sport you've searched.

api_list.name: Get number of games today
api_list.description: With "Get number of games today" you'll receive all sports we support, how many games are today and how many of them are live.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://viperscore.p.rapidapi.com/sports"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "viperscore.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://viperscore.p.rapidapi.com/sports"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "viperscore.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all competitions
api_list.description: With "Get all competitions" you'll receive a list with top competitions (like NFL, Premier League, ...) and all competitions from every sport.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://viperscore.p.rapidapi.com/competitions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "viperscore.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://viperscore.p.rapidapi.com/competitions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "viperscore.p.rapidapi.com"

print(response.json())
